content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 > the lansdowne toque was designed after spotting some charisma tweed hues i loved the color changes and knew i had to make a hat you can purchase the ad-free pattern here or get it for free on my blog purchase any 4 or more regular price patterns in my ravelry shop and get 25% off no coupon code needed all of my patterns have been tested by several accomplished pattern testers and designers to ensure that you are getting a pattern free of mistakes and is easy to follow for giveaways coupons and free patterns please visit my facebook page 2 or my blog 3 you are free to sell what you make from this pattern but you may not share copy or reproduce this pattern in part or whole photographs are also copyright protected and may never be used please link back to one of my shops if selling your finished items online ©pamela dajczak 2018 1 http //www sincerelypam com/lansdowne-toque-free-pattern 2 http //www facebook com/sincerelypam 3 http //www sincerelypam com
